## imageCanvas variable

Creates canvas for given image and draws image, optionally with given new size. If no width/height is given, the canvas will be of same size as image.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
imageCanvas: (img: HTMLImageElement, width?: number | undefined, height?: number | undefined) => CanvasContext
```
